definition.name: AWS Device Farm Browser Testing GitHub Action
definition.description: GitHub action for automated browser testing on AWS Device Farm
definition.author: AWS Device Farm

inputs.name: mode
inputs.description: The mode to run the action in. Ther are 2 values supported: Specify `project` mode when you require creation or looking up of an AWS Device Farm Project ARN. Specify `gridurl` mode when you require a Test Grid URL. Specify `artifact` mode when you require retrieval of artifacts from an existing AWS Device Farm Project ARN.

inputs.name: project-arn
inputs.description: The ARN of the AWS Device Farm Browser Testing Project. Alternatively supply a name and a project will be created on your behalf

inputs.name: url-expires-seconds
inputs.description: Lifetime, in seconds, of the Test Grid URL.

inputs.name: artifact-types
inputs.description: (Optional) A comma delimited list of Device Farm Artifacts that should be downloaded after the jobs completes. https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSJavaScriptSDK/v3/latest/Package/-aws-sdk-client-device-farm/Variable/TestGridSessionArtifactCategory/ Note: To download all artifact types set the value to ALL. To download none skip this input. They will be downloaded to a folder. The name of the folder can be found by referencing the output with name artifact-folder. Please use the GitHub Action [upload-artifact](https://github.com/actions/upload-artifact) to store them.

inputs.name: artifact-folder
inputs.description: (optional) The name of the folder that the test artifacts are downloaded into.

outputs.name: console-url
outputs.description: The AWS Console URL for the Test Grid Project

outputs.name: project-arn
outputs.description: The ARN of the AWS Device Farm Browser Testing Project

outputs.name: grid-url
outputs.description: The AWS Device Farm Test Grid URL (only available in gridurl mode)

outputs.name: grid-url-expires
outputs.description: The Datetime that the supplied grid-url will expire formatted as YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.fffZ
